ns4:Method.description: This method allows a CSM Web Service administrator to create an application context for managing security policy.
ns4:Method.name: createApplication

ns4:Method.description: This method allows a CSM Web Service administrator to remove an application context.
ns4:Method.name: removeApplication

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an administrator of an application to create a protection element in that application.
ns4:Method.name: createProtectionElement

ns4:Method.description: The method allows an administrators of an application to search for protection elements associated with that application.
ns4:Method.name: getProtectionElements

ns4:Method.description: This method allow an application administrator to modify a protection element associated with the application.
ns4:Method.name: modifyProtectionElement

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application administrator to remove a protection element.
ns4:Method.name: removeProtectionElement

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to create a protection group.
ns4:Method.name: createProtectionGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to search for protection groups associated with the application.
ns4:Method.name: getProtectionGroups

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to modify a protection group associated with the application
ns4:Method.name: modifyProtectionGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an admin to remove a protection group associated with the application.
ns4:Method.name: removeProtectionGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allows a application admin to assign protection elements to a protection group.
ns4:Method.name: assignProtectionElements

ns4:Method.description: This method allows a application admin to unassign protection elements from a protection group.
ns4:Method.name: unassignProtectionElements

ns4:Method.description: This method gets a list of protection elements assigned to a protection group.
ns4:Method.name: getProtectionElementsAssignedToProtectionGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method alls an application admin to assign a protection group as a child or another protection group.
ns4:Method.name: assignProtectionGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to unassign a protection group from being a child of a protection group.
ns4:Method.name: unassignProtectionGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to get a list of child protection groups for a protection group
ns4:Method.name: getChildProtectionGroups

ns4:Method.description: This method allow an application admin to get a list of the groups associated with the application.
ns4:Method.name: getGroups

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application administrator to link a Grid Grouper group to CSM, such that access control policy may be provisioned based on membership to the Grid Grouper group.
ns4:Method.name: linkRemoteGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allow an application admin to unlink a remote Grid Grouper group from CSM.
ns4:Method.name: unlinkRemoteGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allows a application admin to create a local group of users on the CSM Web Service
ns4:Method.name: createGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application administrator to remove a local group.
ns4:Method.name: removeGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application administrator to modify the metadata of a local group.
ns4:Method.name: modifyGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to add users to a user group
ns4:Method.name: addUsersToGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to remove users from a user group.
ns4:Method.name: removeUsersFromGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to get a list of the users in a user group.
ns4:Method.name: getUsersInGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allow an admin to create privileges.
ns4:Method.name: createPrivilege

ns4:Method.description: This method allows one to search for privileges
ns4:Method.name: getPrivileges

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an admin to remove a privilege.
ns4:Method.name: removePrivilege

ns4:Method.description: This method allo.ws an admin to modify a privilege
ns4:Method.name: modifyPrivilege

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application administrator to create a role.
ns4:Method.name: createRole

ns4:Method.description: This method allows and admin to get a list of roles based on a specified search criteria.
ns4:Method.name: getRoles

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to modify a role.
ns4:Method.name: modifyRole

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to remove a role.
ns4:Method.name: removeRole

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to set the privileges that make up a role.
ns4:Method.name: setPrivilegesForRole

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to get the privileges associated with a role.
ns4:Method.name: getPrivilegesForRole

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an admin to grant a permission to a user group.
ns4:Method.name: grantGroupPermission

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to revoke a permission from a user group.
ns4:Method.name: revokeGroupPermission

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to grant a user a permission.
ns4:Method.name: grantUserPermission

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to revoke a permission from a user.
ns4:Method.name: revokeUserPermission

ns4:Method.description: This method allows application admins to get the permission granted to a user.
ns4:Method.name: getPermissionsForUser

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to get the permissions granted to a user group.
ns4:Method.name: getPermissionForGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to get the parent protection group of a protection group.
ns4:Method.name: getParentProtectionGroup

ns4:Method.description: This method allow one to determine if a user has been granted a privilege on a resource.
ns4:Method.name: checkPermission

ns4:Method.description: This method allows one to determine whether or not a user has been granted a privilege on a resource.
ns4:Method.name: checkAttributeBasedPermission

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to create a filter clause.
ns4:Method.name: createFilterClause

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to modify a filter clause.
ns4:Method.name: modifyFilterClause

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to search for filter clauses for an application.
ns4:Method.name: getFilterClauses

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an application admin to remove a filter clause.
ns4:Method.name: removeFilterClause

ns4:Method.description: creates a resource to be used to generate instance level security filters
ns4:Method.name: createFilterCreator

ns4:Method.description: creates a FilterCreator reference by using a domain model to navigate the filter classes
ns4:Method.name: createFilterCreatorFromDomainModel

ns260:Method.description: returns the available target classes in this application
ns260:Method.name: getClassNames

ns271:Property.description: The properties file containing configuration options for the CSM Web Service.
The spring configuration file for the CSM Web Service.
